properties.name: Los Santos Tower
properties.desc: The Los Santos Tower is a large 94-story skyscraper in Downtown Los Santos that appears in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

properties.name: Observatory
properties.desc: The Observatory is a facility featured in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. It is a large, ornate building located atop the hill in the district of Verdant Bluffs in Los Santos.

properties.name: Los Santos Forum
properties.desc: The Los Santos Forum is the main stadium in Los Santos in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. It is located at the southeast end of the city, in the border of East Beach and Playa del Seville, and east of Ganton.

properties.name: The Four Dragons Hotel & Casino, commonly known as The Four Dragons Casino or simply The Four Dragons[1] is a casino hotel in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas located on the southernmost side of The Strip in Las Venturas, San Andreas.
The Camel's Toe
properties.desc: The Camel's Toe is a casino and hotel that appears in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. It is located in Las Venturas, San Andreas. The hotel is a parody of the Luxor Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada, including the obelisk tower, the pyramid, and the recreated Sphinx.

properties.name: Pirates In Men's Pants
properties.desc: Pirates in Men's Pants is a casino that appears in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. It is located along The Strip in Las Venturas, San Andreas. It is situated between The High Roller and The Visage, two other casinos along The Strip.
